description: This file defines the S3PDFKnowledgeBase class, which extends S3KnowledgeBase to provide methods for iterating over PDF documents stored in an S3 bucket, both synchronously and asynchronously.

classes.name: S3PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that provides methods to access PDF documents stored in an S3 bucket, extending the base S3KnowledgeBase class.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: A property that yields lists of Document objects from PDF files in the S3 bucket synchronously.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: An asynchronous property that yields lists of Document objects from PDF files in the S3 bucket asynchronously.
